remarks: Value of the function for the vector subtraction operation on a normed complex vector space.  (Contributed by NM, 11-Sep-2007.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 23-Dec-2013.)  (New usage is discouraged.)
statement:
nvmval.1 $e |- X = ( BaseSet ` U ) $.
nvmval.2 $e |- G = ( +v ` U ) $.
nvmval.4 $e |- S = ( .sOLD ` U ) $.
nvmval.3 $e |- M = ( -v ` U ) $.
nvmfval $p |- ( U e. NrmCVec -> M = ( x e. X , y e. X |-> ( x G ( -u 1 S y ) ) ) ) $.
$d G x y $.
$d U x y $.
$d X x y $.
